Posts.Content: Dec 19, 2015 09:12AM MM2221 wrote: Newbie here, Had my first chemo treatment on Tuesday (1/4 treatments) although I don't feel fabulous, I do think it went much better than I feared. Went back Wednesday for the Neulasta injection. My doctor has recommended the Claritin for a few days in efforts to ward off the joint pain. I have been sore, would I be better or worse without the Claratin. No matter, easy to take.  I think water has helped tremendously, I have no serious side effects :-). I have no appetite either but that might be a good thing.  On Friday, I returned for IV fluids which really did help and I hope to pretend that life is normal - one week before Christmas!
Posts.Title: More Tips (and a Shopping List) for Getting Through Chemo rock MinusTwo
